name: nocookiewithoutconsent
description: [ProcessWire](https://processwire.com) module to disable ProcessWire frontend cookie (wire) until user gave consent.
author: cwsoft

scripts.dev: start /MIN npm run tsc && start /MIN npm run sass
scripts.build: npx sass --no-source-map --style=compressed source/sass:css & npx tsc & npx esbuild js/nocowoco.js --outdir=js --minify --allow-overwrite
